title: 98 Best Amazon Prime Day Home Deals 2024 to Shop Before the Sale Ends Tonight
description: The deepest discounts on top air purifiers, vacuums, and kitchen essentials we’ve put to the test
author: Rachel Fletcher, Audrey Lee
excerpt: Just a few hours left to score the deepest discounts on top home essentials we’ve put to the test! Shop Prime Day Home Deals now.
text: Because we’ve tried, tested, and investigated a lot of Amazon products over the years—sheets, towels, mattresses, you name it!—we know the best Prime Day home deals when we see them. With less than 12 hours to shop the sale, you have come to the right place.In fact, we’re so intimately familiar with everything the mega retailer is marking down at any given moment, we can tell you exactly which deals are worth your time and which to skip. Below, find the Amazon Prime Day home deals we recommend this season, because we’ve done the work and put many of them to the test.We’ve rounded up the best home sales we’ve seen over the last nearly 24 rollicking hours from robot vacuums and air purifiers to to cookware and coffee makers. You have until midnight Pacific time to get to it!Our Top Picks for the Best Amazon Prime Day Home DealsTop Vacuum Deal: Dyson V12 Detect Slim+ Cordless Vacuum Cleaner (was $650, now $568)Top Air Purifier Deal: Levoit Vital 200S-P Air Purifier (was $190, now $160)Top Coffee Maker Deal: Keurig K-Duo Plus Single Serve & Carafe Coffee Maker (was $230, now $200)Top Kitchen Deal: Our Place Perfect Pot (was $165, now $120)Top Tech Deal: Apple AirPods Pro 2nd Generation (was $249, now $169)Top TV Deal: Samsung Frame TV with Teak Frame (was $1,646, now $998)Top Mattress Deal: Ashley Chime Medium Firm Hybrid Mattress (was $370, now $290)Top Decor Deal: Loloi Magnolia Home by Joanna Gaines Bark Area Rug (was $158, now $127)Shop by SectionCleaning Prime Day Home DealsAir Purifier Prime Day Home DealsDecor Prime Day Home DealsKitchen Prime Day Home DealsCoffee Prime Day Home DealsBedding Prime Day Home DealsBath Prime Day Home DealsTech & Home Entertainment Prime Day Home DealsCleaning Prime Day Home DealsCordless vacuums? Check. Robot vacuums? Check. Give the surfaces in your home the care they need with exceptional deals on some of our favorite cleaning machines.Dyson V12 Detect Slim+ Cordless Vacuum CleanerIt wouldn’t be Prime Day without at least a dozen cordless vacuum deals. Editor-beloved home tech brand Dyson rarely runs sales, so when we see them slashing prices around this time of year, we know it’s time to hop on it. When she tested the V12 for our best vacuums for hardwood floors story, contributor Terri Williams had this to say about the V12, which is currently even more competitively priced than last Prime Day: “The Dyson V12 Detect Slim Cordless Stick Vacuum has an angled laser that detects a surprising amount of dust particles on the floor. And if that’s not enough, the luxe Dyson cordless vacuum cleaner has a color-coded LCD screen to reveal the types of particles being sucked up by the deep suction motor and passing through the detangling motorbar cleaner head.”iRobot Roomba Combo j7+ Self-Emptying Robot Vacuum & MopLuckily, another one of Williams’s favorite hardwood vacs is also on sale as of writing. This hands-free robot vacuum (a must for any smart home) cleans floors and so much more—we recommended it for pet owners, as its intelligent design is specifically formulated for the fun messes only your furry friends can create. From her review: “[The j7] uses smart scrub technology, meaning it can scrub in back and forth motions and it applies 1.6 pounds of pressure to remove paw prints and other messes created by your beloved pets. It’s intelligent enough to recognize carpet and lift the mopping pads accordingly, so you don’t have to stop and change cleaning modes.” Perhaps the best feature is that it self empties in the charger, meaning you don’t have to deal with cleaning up dust and first every time you run it.BISSELL Little Green Multi-Purpose Portable Carpet and Upholstery Cleaner, Green, 1400BOne of our favorite items on the Prime Day sales list (and perhaps the one with the cutest name) is the Little Green machine from Bissell. Think of this as the little floor cleaner that could. This tiny but mighty cleaner is portable and can get your carpets and upholstery on furniture looking as good as new (more than 80,000 customers agree). Your living room will thank you for this purchase.Bissell CleanView XR Cordless VacuumAnother good ole Bissell—if you’re wanting to go budget for a vacuum, this is a great brand to turn to for a reliable option. Its brushroll is designed to keep things tangle-free, and its LED feature keeps you from missing anything in those pesky corners. And don’t just take our word for it, this model in particular has more than 100,000 happy customers testifying to its cleaning power.roborock Q5 Pro Robot Vacuum and Mop ComboThe Roborock has 250-minute run time—that’s enough time to cover 3,767 square feet—and 3D mapping capability to assess the best route for cleaning. More great features include voice activated control through its app and dual vacuum and mopping capabilities, so it can do both at the same time. $200 just saved you a couple hours, and a weekly cleaning service.Hoover PowerScrub Deluxe Carpet Cleaner MachineTaking the hassle out of the deep cleaning process, this machine has 360-degree brushes and powerful suction to pick up even the deepest stains. The HeatForce feature also works to quickly dry spots, and there are plenty of “extras” included in your purchase: an 8-foot hose, special tools, and a carpet cleaning solution sample.Shark NV360 Navigator Lift-Away Deluxe Upright VacuumThis vacuum has an impressive 0.9-quart capacity, giving you more room for the dust and grime you need to pick up during a deep-cleaning session. And while it has a cord, you can easily maneuver it thanks to the swivel steering feature.iRobot Roomba s9+ (9550) Self Emptying Robot VacuumIt’s rare to see a Roomba marked down as much as half-off. But right now, you can save a whopping $500 off the s9+ model. Unlike many robot vacuums with rounded edges, this one has sensors and a brush to take care of those difficult-to-reach corners. As of 4:30pm, this item is no longer discounted, but it regularly goes on sale, so add it to your wish list for Black Friday!Tineco Pure ONE S11 Cordless Vacuum CleanerOur contributor Terri Williams tested a similar Tineco model on her hardwood floors and was delighted by the results. Not only that, you can put this cordless vacuum to work against pet hair, carpets, cars and more. It's super lightweight (under six pounds), has a 40-minute run time, and is currently 33% off.Miele Complete C2 Hardfloor Bagged Canister Vacuum CleanerThis bagged vacuum cleaner might be compact, but it packs a lot of power. It has six suction power settings and several attachments (which you can store in the vacuum!), so you can tackle different types of flooring. Our contributor Erika Owen tried a similar Miele model and noted how easy it was to move it from room to room thanks to the lightweight design. Another pro? The attached wheels, which rotate in all directions to get into every nook and cranny.Dyson V8 Plus Cordless VacuumWhile this isn’t the latest innovation from Dyson, it’s a tried-and-true favorite. It has a solid runtime for a cordless vacuum (40 minutes), and it can deep clean carpet and hard floors. There’s also MAX mode to treat those extra tough spots and stains, and the head detaches to work as a handheld vacuum. And when you’re all done, the no-touch bin emptying feature keeps your hands clean and away from the dirt and grime.iRobot Roomba j7+ Self-Emptying Robot VacuumThis Roomba model scored high marks with digital features editor Nick Mafi when he tested it for our Best Robot Vacuum story earlier this year. Though it was his first robot vac, he instantly warmed to the automated and hands-off nature of the machine: ”I would recommend this vacuum for all types of consumers, but for people like me who host on the fly, it’s particularly great. In fact, one weekend I decided to host a few friends at my apartment—the problem was, these plans were made last-minute, and while I was away from home. So, instead of coming home to messy floors, I was able to order the robot to clean the space (via the app on my phone) so that when I got home, the space was clean. If only everything in life were that easy.” Get it now for a very generous $400 off.Air Purifier Prime Day Home DealsWhile you’re here, be sure to snag an air purifier or a fan to make sure your air is just as clean as your floors. With deals on Blueair, Levoit and Coway air purifiers running right now, allergies and air pollution don't stand a chance in your house during this Amazon Prime Day season.BLUEAIR Air Purifier 211i MaxWe love a good air purifier deal around these parts and Blueair is one of our most trusted brands for these cleansing gadgets. While you might think spring is the only time you might need an air purifier, the truth is that we need them year round—especially if you’re prone to allergies or live in an area that’s susceptible to wildfires. This model will help keep allergens and air pollutants at bay.Coway Airmega AP-1512HH(W) PurifierIf you’ve got a large room in need of fresh air, take our advice and spring for this under $200 model. Coway is a brand we know and trust—in fact, the Omega 250 (which is also currently on sale, though for almost double the price tag of this model) received top billing in our Best Air Purifiers story, with features editor Nick Mafi calling it “kind of incredible” and citing the power of its four layer filtration system. This particular model has more than 21,000 five-star reviews and comes in at well under $200, which we thinks makes buying one a breeze.Levoit Vital 200S-P Air PurifierHere’s another deal for the pet lovers. This Levoit model was specifically designed to suck up dander and pet hair—as well as all the other stuff that air purifiers can crush like VOCs and smoke. It’s smart, which means you can program a cleaning schedule or shut off time and it can be controlled via your phone. It also gets points for having eco-friendly, price conscious washable filters.Dyson Purifier Cool TP4B Purifying FanThis is the perfect time to take advantage of this dual purifier and tower fan from Dyson. Get up to 350 degrees of cooling with their unique oscillation feature and purify the air while you do it with the brand’s signature HEPA filter system.Levoit Core 400S Smart True HEPA Air PurifierWe spy a nice discount on one of our all time favorite air purifiers. According to our tester, social media manager Rebecca Grambone, “After about a week using the air purifier in my bedroom (along with regular dusting), I noticed that I wasn’t waking up with puffy eyes anymore. This may sound cliché, but the air in my room felt crisper and definitely cleaner.”Prime Day Home Decor DealsWhile you might not think of Amazon as home to loads of chic decor, we’re here to help point you in the right direction for accents that make all the difference.Georg Jensen Bernadotte Stainless Steel Sugar BowlDidn’t think we’d be seeing a host of Prime Day Deals from legendary Georg Jensen anytime soon, but Bezos likes to keep us on our toes. We’re partial to this super chic sugar bowl set, made out of Jensen’s signature stainless steel—currently 25% off!—and we would also recommend perusing the other items the brand is discounting (hello gorgeous cocktail shaker and leather coaster set), as they make great gifts for housewarmings, weddings, and more.Braun Classic Analogue Wall ClockGoing analog is looking very chic with this Bauhaus-influenced wall clock, which would pair perfectly with a silent morning and a black cup of coffee. The hour and minute hands feature luminescent tips for day and night visibility. You’d be surprised how much an analog clock keeps you from looking at your phone.Sabre Paris Tortoise Cutlery (Set of 5)One of our all time favorite silverware brands has a little discount running during Prime Day and it’s making us wonder if we should change things up for our next dinner party. While most of Sabre’s sets are full price right now, this lovely five-piece tortoise setting is 17% off.Alessi Parrot Sommelier-Style CorkscrewAnother one of our favorite housewarming gifts to give, this Alessi parrot corkscrew is undeniably adorable. It’s also available in black which, yes is less expensive, but we much prefer the multicolor version to put a smile on your giftee’s face—and it is still 15% off. Pair with a bottle of wine or corked beverage of choice for an even more elevated gift.Loloi Magnolia Home by Joanna Gaines Mona Collection Area RugWhen design juggernaut Joanna Gaines drops a collection of area rugs with Loloi, we’re listening. When they’re up to 20% off during October Prime Day, we’re adding to cart immediately. Loloi is a brand long known for its quality and collaborations with all stars like Gaines, Gwyneth Paltrow’s designer Brigette Romanek, Amber Lewis, and more. Dozens more of our favorite Amazon rugs are on sale as we speak!YnM Chunky Throw BlanketThere’s chunky knit, and then there’s chunkiest knit. Even looking at this blanket makes us feel relaxed. It comes in 21 color varieties, but the cerulean blue is doing wonders to calm the mind. Aside from being made by one of our favorite weighted blanket brands, it’s also zero-shed and machine washable!KDG Cordless Table Lamp (Set of 2)You’ve almost certainly seen and/or played with a version of one of these dimmable, portable lamps at a restaurant in the last few years. Why not bring a few home with you? They’re practical, versatile, and one of the more reliable portable lamp options out there. We love their transitional quality—which can suit a kitchen table, a desk, or a patio table (they’re outdoor proof!). Black seems the obvious choice, but we like the brushed nickel, too!Gibson Elite Rhinebeck 16-Piece Dinnerware SetOne of our favorite dinnerware sets is also one of the most affordable this October! A 16-piece set for $60, both microwave and dishwasher safe. We love the stoneware design, which would suggest a much higher price point, and your guests will never know.Mackenzie-Childs Checkered Tissue Box CoverSomewhat of a polarizing figure int he design world, Mackenzie-Childs is known for whimsical, maximalist designs often featuring a checkered pattern. This tissue box cover adds a little touch of design to an otherwise not so lovely item, and we are here for the $30 price cut.Phantoscope Pack of 2 Velvet Decorative Throw Pillow Covers12,000 Amazon customers love this velvet throw pillow set, which comes in basically every colorway possible, as well as six different sizes to best compliment your couch to pillow ratio. If you’re like us and went in on the white couch trend, we’re going dark coffee, taupe, or blue for decor options. We love that they’re soft, simple, and machine washable.Nest New York Classic Grapefruit Scented CandleWe can be hard-pressed to find a good candle under $40 these days, so we’re glad this one from popular candle maker NEST New York comes in just under the bar at $38. We’re partial to the crisp grapefruit variety, but several other popular scents are discounted as well.Mueller Fruit BowlA perennial design lover favorite, the Mueller fruit bowl is now 40% off. On sale in white, gray, and a punchy lime green, you can keep it front and center on a kitchen countertop or use it on a desk for mail. It would also make a fine centerpiece for a dining or coffee table.Best Choice Products 8-Cube Storage OrganizerThese customizable and solid wood shelves come in every neutral color to best suit your space. They’re an easy and attractive storage hack for toys, books, yarn, all the random wires and plugs we accumulate and have one reserved basket for, or anything else you’re tired of seeing on your floor—these shelves can provide a storing refuge.Oiahomy Woven Storage Basket (Set of 3)In our opinion, you can never (ever!) have too many decorative storage baskets. As long as there’s space, there’s likely stuff to fill them and this set, available in a pack of three, is a very handsome option. Try one of several different colorways and sizes if you want to spice things up.Nathan James Mina Rattan NightstandGood furniture on Amazon can be hard to come by, and we are most definitely experts on that. Nathan James is one of the more reliable brand names you can find on the megaretailer’s site, and we particularly appreciate the mixed materials on this little nightstand, cheap enough to get a set of two during October Prime Day at 15% off.Amazon Basics Saddle-Seat Stool (Set of 2)At 24 inches and in walnut, black, and white, this handsome stool set will most certainly work for your high-top, bar, kitchen island turned workspace, you name it. Put a plant on them, use them in a mudroom, either way they would be a handsome addition to your home.Christopher Knight Home Louver Club ChairsWe’ve said it once and we’ll say it again, fall Prime Day is a great time to stock up on outdoor furniture. We typically see much deeper discounts in October than July (perhaps the reasons for that are obvious!) but if you are looking to stash away some discounted digs that you can use next season—or you live in warmer climes—we definitely recommend hopping on bigger purchases, like these Christopher Knight chairs before the sale wraps.nuLOOM Round Rigo Jute RugPair that new set of chairs with a round outdoor rug. Though we will say that this nuLOOM rug, made of natural fibers and available in 12 colors, would look equally at home indoors as out. It also comes in more size and shape varieties than we can count and has nearly 17,000 5-star reviews from Amazon shoppers.Kitchen Prime Day Home DealsOne room in the home that shouldn't be ignored when it comes to all the things Prime Day has to offer: the kitchen.There are lots of good deals being cooked up this time around—think markdowns on appliances and gadgets abound. Top rated coffeemakers, nonstick or stainless steel cookware, air fryers and more are in the mix. Don’t skip a Prime Day sale must-have kitchen appliances like a blender or a standing mixer.Vitamix 5200 BlenderIf you’ve ever wanted a Vitamix, we’d highly recommend taking advantage of this price tag while you can. This Amazon Big Deal Days price the lowest we’ve seen this particular model priced at and it was a bestseller during last year’s Prime Day sale as well. Your smoothies will never look the same—get it while the two-day sale window lasts.KitchenAid Classic Series Stand Mixer K45SSThe perfect gift for the baker or serious chef in your life, if ever there was one. This iconic stand mixer from Kitchenaid is one of the better discounts we’ve seen and it’s iconic for many reasons: It has ten speeds to do everything from making pasta dough to whipping cream, has a removable and easy-to-wash stainless steel bowl, and comes with a one-year limited warranty.Our Place Ceramic Perfect PotSeen in the of many an AD editor and many a celebrity (we’re looking at you cover star Justina Blakeney) the Perfect Pot from Our Place is both functional cookware and great to look at. And, at more than $60 off, if you’ve had your eye on the internet famous brand, now is the time to jump!Our Place Always Pan 2.0Go ahead and buy the matching set, we’re not judging! As one of the more exciting cookware brands of the last few years, Our Place made its debut with the Always Pan, which has since been upgraded to outshine the original. The 2.0 is oven safe up to 450 degrees and they reconfigured the nonstick ceramic coating for longer use.Le Creuset Enameled Cast Iron Signature Sauteuse Oven, 3.5 qt, MeringueFor a more classic cookware look and feel, there is always Le Creuset. An investment piece for the ages, you can save $30 on this 3.5 quart sauteuse. We also caught a great deal on their cast iron skillet if that’s up your alley.Staub Ceramics Rectangular Baking Dish SetWe spotted some Staub on sale as well! Make like Gwyneth Paltrow (her kitchen is absolutely filled with pieces of every shape and size) and stock up immediately. This 2-piece ceramic set is a healthy 16% off, and it’s the lowest price on the set in the last 30 days. It’s a good thing we love cherry red because the other colorways are not on sale. If you dig them as much as we do, the cocottes are also discounted.KitchenAid 6 Speed Hand Mixer with Flex Edge BeatersIf you’re looking for a hand mixer, this one has more than 16,000 five-star reviews. Like many KitchenAid products, it’s sold in several colors and the Contour Silver and Ice Blue versions are also discounted at the moment (though we are partial to the red).All-Clad D3 3-Ply Stainless Steel Fry Pan SetYou can always count on Prime Day for a classic cookware deal. And, while we have covered Staub and Le Creuset, All-Clad has also delivered with significant savings on multiple products. This stainless steel pan set, for example, is currently $50 off its original price. Regarded by professional and home chefs, All-Clad’s cookware is backed with a limited lifetime warranty and they’ve also been manufacturing in the same Pennsylvania factory for over 50 years.AILTEC Glass Food Storage Containers with LidsWe'll categorize these snap-and-go food glass food storage containers as an item you can never have too many of. Whether it's for everyday use or sharing the holiday leftovers, you won't regret adding to cart, especially not at 15% off.OXO Good Grips 3-Piece Plastic Mixing Bowl SetSpeaking of stocking up, when OXO puts an almost-20% off deal on their top-rated mixing bowls, it’s time to hop to it. Plus, with their sea foamy color palette, they’d make a great holiday gift for the chef or baker in your life.Drinking Glasses with Glass Straw (Set of 4)For an eco-friendly alternative to disposable cups and straws, this set has it all. It comes with three glasses, four straws, and two straw-cleaning brushes. Plus, it is really great to look at and would be perfect for every day use or hosting.Umite Chef Kitchen Cooking Utensils Set, 33 pcs Non-Stick Utensils Spatula Set with HolderWhether you’re a budding chef or simply looking for new tools, this 33-piece set of nonstick utensils provides you with practically everything you need. It’s also available in seven other colors.Amazon Basics Kitchen Storage Microwave Rack CartMake more space this Prime Day with a portable kitchen cart. Made by Amazon Basics, this double rack wonder has more than 15,000 positive reviews and will cost you under $50. Plus, it comes with handy hooks for kitchen towels or oven mitts.Acacia Wood Cutting BoardAnother multipurpose piece that could also make a great gift, this 5-star rated cutting board is 25% off and you can apply an additional $5 off coupon at checkout. At $25 each, you might want to snag a few!Wüsthof Classic Hollow Edge 2-Piece Chef's Knife SetWhen it comes to knives, few brands are trusted more than Wüsthof. Founded more than 200 years ago, this family owned brand knows a thing or two about construction. Shop now for $25 off.Ninja Foodi 10-in-1 XL Pro Air Fry OvenAir fryer this, air fryer that—does anyone remember the good old convection oven? This thing replaces the need for a microwave, a toaster, and 60% of my use for an oven. You can cook two trays of food in this convection oven, and one of those trays can be a 12-pound turkey. It’s not kidding around.Calphalon Kitchen Knife Set with Self-Sharpening BlockWe all know and love Calphalon’s non-stick pots and pans, but did you know they make best-selling knives, too? This 15-piece knife set is currently 40% off during Prime Day, and it comes with nearly 2,500 five-star reviews. Happy customers note how sharp the stainless steel blades are, and say that it’s a great gift for yourself or a friend. If you want a smaller-scale option, the six- and 12-piece sets are also marked down for a limited time.Nutribullet Pro+ Personal BlenderNutribullet blenders are beloved by our editors and celebrities—back in 2022, you might remember Chlöe Bailey told AD she uses her own Nutribullet daily to prepare smoothies. This one is 42% off right now, and it comes with convenient to-go lids, which you can pop onto the cup before heading out for the day. Fortunately, the cup is also dishwasher-safe and you can easily rinse off the blades with a little soap and water.KitchenAid Deluxe Pasta Stand Mixer Attachments (Set of 5)If you’ve already purchased the classic KitchenAid stand mixer, consider adding one of its most popular attachments to your lineup. This five-piece set makes it easier than ever to make handmade pasta. Fettuccine, spaghetti, and even lasagna are all on the menu with this set, which is now 23% off. If you’re looking for even more KitchenAid deals, the pasta kit is also discounted when you bundle it with a hand blender or ice cream attachment.Carote 21-Piece Nonstick Cookware SetThis 21-piece non-stick cookware set from Carote is as aesthetically pleasing as it is effective. More than 18,000 five-star reviewers rave about how these pots and pans are high-quality, easy to clean, and stylish. The set is just under $200, but for a limited time, it’s 33% off. Most of the brand’s other cookware sets are also discounted, but this is definitely the best bang for your buck.Prime Day Coffee Maker Home DealsWe have a feeling we’re not alone in our obsession with all things caffeine, so hopefully you'll appreciate the lengths we've gone through to test more than 20 coffee makers and espresso machines throughout the years. Luckily, many of our favorite models are on sale during Prime DAy—so pour yourself a cup and get shopping.Breville Barista Express Espresso MachineIf you want to pulls shots like a pro, the handsome brushed stainless steel Breville Barista Express will get you there. It’s a highly trusted brand in the espresso machine space, and at a whopping $200 off, it might be time to level up your coffee game. Skip a trip to your local café by investing in an espresso machine that will make you look and feel like a pro. The Amazon best-seller also comes with an integrated grinder and a grind size dial to ensure you get exactly what you want.Keurig K-Duo Plus Single Serve & Carafe Coffee MakerWhether you like it iced or piping hot, this single-serve Keurig coffee maker is here to help. Williams named it her favorite single-serve machine on the market. You can choose your cup size and brew it perfectly with just the touch of a button.Technivorm Moccamaster 53935 KBGV Coffee MakerArguably the best looking coffee maker on the market, this millennial pink Technivorm is 16% off during Prime Day. According to our contributor and coffee pro Lauren Joseph, this is a deal you don’t want to miss. “The Technivorm Moccamaster is the ideal drip coffee machine. Since 1968 this iconic machine has been beloved by coffee lovers for its showerhead design, which sprays all of the coffee grounds evenly,” she said in her review. “The carafe retains heat well, and it is incredibly durable. The interface is simple and a breeze to operate—even pre-caffeine. While the Moccamaster is bit of a splurge, it comes with a five-year warranty, and it is known for its high-quality design.”Fellow Stagg EKG Electric Gooseneck KettleEveryone (including Travis Barker—have you seen his matcha station?) loves the Stagg kettle from Fellow. Score it now for $33 off the retail price.Café Specialty Drip Coffee MakerOne of our favorite coffeemakers is also currently discounted at a hearty 23% off. Not only did our contributor Terri Williams say it's a great match for “the coffee drinker who also adores all things well designed,” she also praised its wi-fi capabilities, its superior brewing, and its programmable features.Smeg Retro Style Drip Coffee MachineWe didn’t see many Smeg deals this year, which is a bit of a bummer, but this darling little coffee maker is so cute it sort of makes up for it. While it looks like something out of The Jetsons, it’s got modern capabilities like auto start, an LED display screen, and a warmer tray. We love the stainless finish and the fact that it’s $60 off.De’Longhi Magnifica EvoCappuccino and iced coffee lovers, this is the machine for you. It can make seven different coffee drinks, including a macchiato. There are also 13 different grind settings available, and it’s compatible with non-dairy milk, too.Nespresso Vertuo Next with Aeroccino Milk FrotherIs it finally time to take home the Nespresso you’ve been wanting? We think so. At 35% off, you can purchase the popular coffee and espresso maker for just under $150. Another major incentive is that it comes with a frother, so you can whip up a cappuccino, latte, or steamed milk to pour into your morning coffee. If you only want the Nespresso machine, it’s also sold separately at 35% off for a limited time.Keurig K-Slim Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee MakerThis Keurig is more simplistic than other coffee makers on the market, but it’s the No. 1 best-selling single-serve brewer on Amazon for a reason with more than 46,000 five-star reviews. It’s half-off right now, meaning you’re only a few clicks away from having a fresh cup of Joe (or two, or three) in the comfort of your own home. It comes in three colors (black, red, and white), but only the black and red coffee makers are 50% off during the sale—don’t ask us, we don’t make the rules.Bedding Prime Day Home DealsCalifornia Design Den Luxury SheetsAnother AD editor favorite, these 1,000-thread count sheets have great seasonal flexibility, and only soften with wash! According to commerce editor Audrey Lee, don’t be turned off by the sheets softness, “I was incredibly impressed by the quality of these sheets because they really do feel five-star hotel-level luxurious,” she said. “Though I was admittedly a little wary at first due to the thickness of the cotton (which read as too hot in my mind), the 1,000-thread count sheets proved to be cool and airy on warmer nights and particularly cozy in cooler temperatures when I paired them with my favorite comforter.”Mellanni Hotel Luxury 1800 Sheet SetAn Amazon best seller, AD contributor Kristi called these “a basic sheet at a bargain price,” a thin sheet set suitable for hot nights.Lane Linen 100% Organic, Long-Staple Cotton Queen Sheets (Percale Weave)A discount on another one of our favorite Amazon sheet sets? Yes please! Kellogg said you can count on these sheets for a “breathable and cooling” sleep experience—plus, they come in more than 20 earthy colors.Signature Design by Ashley Chime 12" Medium Firm Memory Foam MattressWhen we say our readers went nuts for this Ashley Chime mattress last Prime Day, we are not kidding. It was by far one of the most popular products purchased throughout the whole of the event. With over 50,000 reviews and a sub-$300 price point, it’s no wonder so many of you added to cart!Nectar Premier Medium Firm Gel Memory Foam MattressHailed as our editors’ favorite mattress for side sleepers, the Nectar Premier is a medium-firm gel memory foam mattress we love—and it’s 39% off right now. Here’s one positive review from senior SEO manager Katie Henwood, who tested it out firsthand: “It offers extra support without sacrificing comfort, and getting into bed each night is like falling into a cloud. For any fellow light sleepers who share their bed with a loud partner: You won’t feel a thing when your bed mate is tossing and turning. It's the best memory foam mattress I’ve tried—it cancels out any movement so you can sleep peacefully through the night regardless of what is going on around you.”Best Price Mattress Store Signature Green Tea Memory FoamOnce you know a mattress can be green tea-infused, it’s hard to go back. This six-inch version (named one of our favorite mattresses on Amazon right now) is medium firm, great for both back and side sleepers, and combines one inch of memory foam with two inches of a supersoft foam layer on top of a supportive three-inch base layer. More than 29,000 Amazon customers agree it’s a worthwhile buy.Mellow Classic Solid Wood Platform Bed FrameWhen we named this Mellow frame one of the best bed frames on Amazon, we called it a great choice if you’re not looking to shell out on a Floyd but still going for that simple, classic platform bed look. At under $175, you can feel good about not breaking the bank and picking a new bed that comes with a five year warranty.Coop Home Goods Original Loft Bed PillowsStomach sleepers and back sleepers, pay attention: the Coop home pillow is the one you've been looking for if you need a something more on the medium firm side. It’s made of nontoxic materials to keep you safe, and it's adjustable if you need a little more, or a little less, fluff. This is one deal you should sleep on, according to more than 59,000 Amazon reviews.Kin By Tuft & Needle 10-Inch Queen MattressAnother option from Tuft & Needle, the Kin delivers pressure relief with cradling adaptive foam, breathability with open cell technology, and optimal support all for a fairly affordable price that’s now even more affordable thanks to the Prime Day.ZINUS 12 Inch Ultra Cooling Gel Memory Foam MattressHot sleepers will meet their match in this cooling mattress. In addition to the cooling gel in the mattress itself, it’s also designed to promote airflow and comes with a Cool-to-Touch Soft-Knit cover.Casper Sleep Element MattressCasper’s popular memory foam mattress is discounted for a limited time. All sizes are currently 30% off.Suatien Silk Pillowcase (Set of 2)By now, you’ve likely heard about the host of benefits silk pillowcases have for your skin and hair. Thousands of customers are obsessed with this particular set of two pillowcases, which are made from luxurious mulberry silk. Right now, the set is up to 45% off during the sale. You can’t go wrong with a classic neutral, but there are 44 total colors and patterns to choose from (all of which are on sale!). For even more savings, you can score 5% off one set when you purchase two.Beckham Hotel Collection Bed Pillows (Set of 2)Amazon’s #1 best seller in pillows are these hotel quality and down alternative ones, which also have a cooling gel so you never have to flip your pillow to the cold side. They’re suitable for back, stomach, and side sleepers, plus they’re machine washable.Bath Prime Day Home DealsThere’s no better time to upgrade on essentials for what some might consider the most important room in the house. Discounted towels, bath mats, hampers and even viral toilet seat/bidet attachments are aplenty while the sale continues.Chakir Turkish Linens 100% Cotton Premium Turkish Towels for BathroomAnother one our favorite Amazon home sales, the best-selling Chakir bath towel sets are on super sale as we speak. At a solid 24% off, this super absorbent set of four (which is beloved by our team) is still an easy add-to-cart. More than 19,000 enthusiastic reviewers agree!Peri Home Panama Stripe Boho Farmhouse Tassel Shower CurtainAnother essential you should think about sprucing up with this season? The shower curtain. It'll instantly upgrade your bathroom and feel like a brand new space. The tassels and the 27% discount really sealed the deal for us.SONORO KATE Bathroom RugsIs it time to replace your old bath mat? If so, this rug is cushioned with memory foam, has a non-slip backing, and is machine-washable. Plus it has more than 17,000 reviews to back it up.The Laundress Signature DetergentIf you haven’t tried the heavenly scents and newly refigured ingredients of The Laundress, consider this your sign from the universe to go ahead and do just that. They lead the game in fine fragrance for the laundry space and, if you’re already a fan, their gallon-sized detergents are on sale, too.HiLIFE Steamer for ClothesPrime Day is also a great time to stock up on those little gadgets that you might not think about until you’re in a pinch. Case in point: A handheld steamer—something we think every home should have on hand. Amazon’s best selling product in the category, it weighs just under two pounds and has an extra long cord (nine feet to be exact) so you’re not schlepping it from room to room.American Soft Linen Luxury 6-Piece Towel SetThis is the #1 seller in Bath Towel Sets on Amazon, and with 63,000 positive reviews, we’re on board. These are soft, absorbent, thick, and come in twenty color varieties so they can compliment your already carefully-curated bathroom vibe. And, they are over $50 off!Madison Park Signature 100% Cotton Turkish Bath Towel 8-Piece SetAnother high contender for a luxurious bath towel set, and the comments call them “thick, fluffy, and absorbent.” They’re also 100% cotton so they wash well without deteriorating!Tech & Home Entertainment Prime Day SalesWhen else are you going to see deals on hands-free Apple AirPods and Bluetooth smart speakers, as well as home security and Smart TVs? Check out the top tech Prime Day deals we’re eyeing (though still holding out for a great Samsung Frame offer!).Apple AirPods Pro (2nd Generation)One of our favorite tech deals so far, you can move from the bedroom to the Zoom with a solid 24% off these cordless Airpod Pros (or replace that pair you dropped down the subway stairs or left in the washing machine). After all, it wouldn’t be Prime Day without an Apple deal.Apple AirPods (3rd Generation) Wireless Ear BudsWith an upgraded, more rounded design and an IPX4 rating for sweat and water resistance, the 3rd gen set is perfect if you want to level up your listening experience.Amazon Fire TV 55" Omni QLED Series 4K UHD Smart TVAmazon’s October Prime Day would not be complete without a TV deal. You can now save $160 on this smart, wifi-enabled modle, which promises a high-quality picture and connectivity to Alexa. You won’t even need a Fire TV stick for the full viewing experience. Plus, other sizes are also on sale now.SAMSUNG The Frame 55” TV with Teak BezelWant something a little more luxe? Go for The Frame by Samsung. It is the unofficial TV for design lovers, as it’s not technically a TV until you want it to be. In the meantime, it’s a work of art designed by Yves Béhar. The 55-inch version is currently 26% (or $348) off and there are many other sizes are on sale as well, ranging from 32 to 85 inches.Surge Protector Power Strip - 8 Outlets with 4 USB Charging PortsHere is another household good you can never have too many of if you ask us—especially when they’re 30% off. You can choose a five-, six-, ten-, 15- or 20-foot option, depending on how much leeway you’ll need to reach a power source, and you can fit eight plugs and two USB cords knowing you’ve got extra surge protection to back up all your power needs.Google Nest WiFi Pro -3 PackWe’ve all been there, but if your wifi sucks, it doesn’t really matter how great your devices are. We’ve been using Google’s mesh wifi networks since the very early work from home days in 2020 and have to say that it is worth every penny to have your wifi enhanced with their local router points. This set comes in a pack of three in case you live in a larger space and have trouble connecting in certain parts of your home.Amazon Echo SpotAnother great gadget for your smart home, the new Amazon Echo Spot is more than your average alarm clock. this fun device allows you to control other Amazon enabled services in your home like the temperature, locks, lights, and more. You can also play music or podcasts simply by chatting with Alexa. Amazon has also been upping their privacy and data collection standards of late, so be sure to read the fine print before you add to cart.Anker Magnetic Portable Charger 5KEveryone could probably use one of these. And if you have a compatible case, you can use the charger’s magnets to wirelessly connect it to an iPhone 14 or 15. Plus, this is the lowest price we’ve spotted on it all year.Google Nest Smart ThermostatKeep your climate under control from anywhere with this programmable smart thermostat. It's compatible with Alexa, Google assistant, Nest device or your mobile phone. As the temperature starts to drop, you’ll appreciate having a trusty thermostat on hand. It mounts to the wall, but you can control if from anywhere. Plus, it’s a Nest product, which means it's lovely to look at.Hatch Restore 2 Sunrise Alarm ClockWe are big fans of the Hatch alarm clock here at Clever. It received a Sleep Award just this March for all it brings to the bedroom and your nighttime routine. Here’s what senior digital editor Zoë Sessums had to say about it: “Building off of the brand’s previous alarm, the sleeker Hatch Restore 2 is a smart sleep device that is designed to help you improve your sleep and wake up feeling refreshed. With its customizable lighting, soothing sounds, and smart sunrise alarm, the aesthetically pleasing Hatch Restore 2 creates an ideal environment for a restful night’s sleep and even better morning. Oh, yeah, it even works as a sound machine.” Shop it now while it’s 28% off.Google Pixel Tablet with Charging Speaker Dock - 256 GBDon’t worry there’s something for the Android heads out there, too. The Google Pixel tablet—which is available with or without the charging speaker dock—has similar functionality to the iPad when it comes to streaming, battery life and more (though the standard choice start at 128GB of storage). Different strokes as they say. It’s also super easy to connect your existing accounts and apps (we know from personal experience!) so you can start using the Pixel basically straight out of the box. The price on this one went up $22 from yesterday, but it is still 25% off if you don’t want to wait until the next sale!Google Nest Doorbell (2nd Gen)If you’ve been meaning to finally invest in a video doorbell for your smart home, we recommend hopping on this 44% off price tag! From a design perspective alone, we prefer it to the Ring but the Google Nest camera is battery powered for easy installation and upkeep, and you'll (hopefully) never miss a package delivery again.INSIGNIA 24-inch Class F20 Series Smart HD 720p Fire TVOne of the more compelling home sales right now, this Amazon FireTV is 46% off and comes with more than 5,500 satisfied reviews. It’s also Alexa voice controlled. Looking for something bigger? The 32-inch versions of this Smart TV is discounted, too.Amazon Fire TV Stick 4K MaxMake streaming your favorite shows and movies a breeze when you plug an Amazon Fire TV Stick into your TV. The latest model is now 42% off, and it’s been upgraded with a more powerful processor and 16GB of storage (twice as much as the original Fire TV Stick 4). Amazon notes that Wi-Fi 6E support, which you can get by snagging a marked down eero Wi-Fi router, is recommended for a better streaming experience.Sonos Arc SoundbarIf you’re interested in improving the sound quality of your TV and movie viewing experience, consider topping it off with a Sonos Arc speaker. This small and slender device connects via Wi-Fi and provides surround sound in your living room. For those worried about aesthetics, the sleek and sophisticated speaker also doesn’t distract from your interior design. At a hefty $899 market price, we were excited to see that it’s 20% off during October Prime Day.How does Amazon Prime Day work?A Prime membership is required to take advantage of all the best Prime Day deals. Luckily, it is very easy to become an Amazon Prime member. They offer a free 30-day trial for newbies, and after that it’s $14.99 per month or $139 per year to take advantage of fast free delivery, Prime Video, and all the other benefits the mega retailer offers.Now, as for the deals. Some last the full 48 hours, others are what they call “lightning deals” and they usually don’t last more than a few hours, so you have to act fast to take advantage. New offers on trending products roll in pretty consistently.
html:
Because we’ve tried, tested, and investigated a lot of Amazon products over the years—sheets, towels, mattresses, you name it!—we know the best Prime Day home deals when we see them. With less than 12 hours to shop the sale, you have come to the right place.

In fact, we’re so intimately familiar with everything the mega retailer is marking down at any given moment, we can tell you exactly which deals are worth your time and which to skip. Below, find the Amazon Prime Day home deals we recommend this season, because we’ve done the work and put many of them to the test.

We’ve rounded up the best home sales we’ve seen over the last nearly 24 rollicking hours from robot vacuums and air purifiers to to cookware and coffee makers. You have until midnight Pacific time to get to it!

Our Top Picks for the Best Amazon Prime Day Home Deals

  • Top Vacuum Deal: Dyson V12 Detect Slim+ Cordless Vacuum Cleaner (was $650, now $568)
  • Top Air Purifier Deal: Levoit Vital 200S-P Air Purifier (was $190, now $160)
  • Top Coffee Maker Deal: Keurig K-Duo Plus Single Serve & Carafe Coffee Maker (was $230, now $200)
  • Top Kitchen Deal: Our Place Perfect Pot (was $165, now $120)
  • Top Tech Deal: Apple AirPods Pro 2nd Generation (was $249, now $169)
  • Top TV Deal: Samsung Frame TV with Teak Frame (was $1,646, now $998)
  • Top Mattress Deal: Ashley Chime Medium Firm Hybrid Mattress (was $370, now $290)
  • Top Decor Deal: Loloi Magnolia Home by Joanna Gaines Bark Area Rug (was $158, now $127)

Shop by Section

  • Cleaning Prime Day Home Deals
  • Air Purifier Prime Day Home Deals
  • Decor Prime Day Home Deals
  • Kitchen Prime Day Home Deals
  • Coffee Prime Day Home Deals
  • Bedding Prime Day Home Deals
  • Bath Prime Day Home Deals
  • Tech & Home Entertainment Prime Day Home Deals

Cleaning Prime Day Home Deals

Cordless vacuums? Check. Robot vacuums? Check. Give the surfaces in your home the care they need with exceptional deals on some of our favorite cleaning machines.

Dyson V12 Detect Slim+ Cordless Vacuum Cleaner

It wouldn’t be Prime Day without at least a dozen cordless vacuum deals. Editor-beloved home tech brand Dyson rarely runs sales, so when we see them slashing prices around this time of year, we know it’s time to hop on it. When she tested the V12 for our best vacuums for hardwood floors story, contributor Terri Williams had this to say about the V12, which is currently even more competitively priced than last Prime Day: “The Dyson V12 Detect Slim Cordless Stick Vacuum has an angled laser that detects a surprising amount of dust particles on the floor. And if that’s not enough, the luxe Dyson cordless vacuum cleaner has a color-coded LCD screen to reveal the types of particles being sucked up by the deep suction motor and passing through the detangling motorbar cleaner head.”

iRobot Roomba Combo j7+ Self-Emptying Robot Vacuum & Mop

Luckily, another one of Williams’s favorite hardwood vacs is also on sale as of writing. This hands-free robot vacuum (a must for any smart home) cleans floors and so much more—we recommended it for pet owners, as its intelligent design is specifically formulated for the fun messes only your furry friends can create. From her review: “[The j7] uses smart scrub technology, meaning it can scrub in back and forth motions and it applies 1.6 pounds of pressure to remove paw prints and other messes created by your beloved pets. It’s intelligent enough to recognize carpet and lift the mopping pads accordingly, so you don’t have to stop and change cleaning modes.” Perhaps the best feature is that it self empties in the charger, meaning you don’t have to deal with cleaning up dust and first every time you run it.

BISSELL Little Green Multi-Purpose Portable Carpet and Upholstery Cleaner, Green, 1400B

One of our favorite items on the Prime Day sales list (and perhaps the one with the cutest name) is the Little Green machine from Bissell. Think of this as the little floor cleaner that could. This tiny but mighty cleaner is portable and can get your carpets and upholstery on furniture looking as good as new (more than 80,000 customers agree). Your living room will thank you for this purchase.

Bissell CleanView XR Cordless Vacuum

Another good ole Bissell—if you’re wanting to go budget for a vacuum, this is a great brand to turn to for a reliable option. Its brushroll is designed to keep things tangle-free, and its LED feature keeps you from missing anything in those pesky corners. And don’t just take our word for it, this model in particular has more than 100,000 happy customers testifying to its cleaning power.

roborock Q5 Pro Robot Vacuum and Mop Combo

The Roborock has 250-minute run time—that’s enough time to cover 3,767 square feet—and 3D mapping capability to assess the best route for cleaning. More great features include voice activated control through its app and dual vacuum and mopping capabilities, so it can do both at the same time. $200 just saved you a couple hours, and a weekly cleaning service.

Hoover PowerScrub Deluxe Carpet Cleaner Machine

Taking the hassle out of the deep cleaning process, this machine has 360-degree brushes and powerful suction to pick up even the deepest stains. The HeatForce feature also works to quickly dry spots, and there are plenty of “extras” included in your purchase: an 8-foot hose, special tools, and a carpet cleaning solution sample.

Shark NV360 Navigator Lift-Away Deluxe Upright Vacuum

This vacuum has an impressive 0.9-quart capacity, giving you more room for the dust and grime you need to pick up during a deep-cleaning session. And while it has a cord, you can easily maneuver it thanks to the swivel steering feature.

iRobot Roomba s9+ (9550) Self Emptying Robot Vacuum

It’s rare to see a Roomba marked down as much as half-off. But right now, you can save a whopping $500 off the s9+ model. Unlike many robot vacuums with rounded edges, this one has sensors and a brush to take care of those difficult-to-reach corners. As of 4:30pm, this item is no longer discounted, but it regularly goes on sale, so add it to your wish list for Black Friday!

Tineco Pure ONE S11 Cordless Vacuum Cleaner

Our contributor Terri Williams tested a similar Tineco model on her hardwood floors and was delighted by the results. Not only that, you can put this cordless vacuum to work against pet hair, carpets, cars and more. It's super lightweight (under six pounds), has a 40-minute run time, and is currently 33% off.

Miele Complete C2 Hardfloor Bagged Canister Vacuum Cleaner

This bagged vacuum cleaner might be compact, but it packs a lot of power. It has six suction power settings and several attachments (which you can store in the vacuum!), so you can tackle different types of flooring. Our contributor Erika Owen tried a similar Miele model and noted how easy it was to move it from room to room thanks to the lightweight design. Another pro? The attached wheels, which rotate in all directions to get into every nook and cranny.

Dyson V8 Plus Cordless Vacuum

While this isn’t the latest innovation from Dyson, it’s a tried-and-true favorite. It has a solid runtime for a cordless vacuum (40 minutes), and it can deep clean carpet and hard floors. There’s also MAX mode to treat those extra tough spots and stains, and the head detaches to work as a handheld vacuum. And when you’re all done, the no-touch bin emptying feature keeps your hands clean and away from the dirt and grime.

iRobot Roomba j7+ Self-Emptying Robot Vacuum

This Roomba model scored high marks with digital features editor Nick Mafi when he tested it for our Best Robot Vacuum story earlier this year. Though it was his first robot vac, he instantly warmed to the automated and hands-off nature of the machine: ”I would recommend this vacuum for all types of consumers, but for people like me who host on the fly, it’s particularly great. In fact, one weekend I decided to host a few friends at my apartment—the problem was, these plans were made last-minute, and while I was away from home. So, instead of coming home to messy floors, I was able to order the robot to clean the space (via the app on my phone) so that when I got home, the space was clean. If only everything in life were that easy.” Get it now for a very generous $400 off.

Air Purifier Prime Day Home Deals

While you’re here, be sure to snag an air purifier or a fan to make sure your air is just as clean as your floors. With deals on Blueair, Levoit and Coway air purifiers running right now, allergies and air pollution don't stand a chance in your house during this Amazon Prime Day season.

BLUEAIR Air Purifier 211i Max

We love a good air purifier deal around these parts and Blueair is one of our most trusted brands for these cleansing gadgets. While you might think spring is the only time you might need an air purifier, the truth is that we need them year round—especially if you’re prone to allergies or live in an area that’s susceptible to wildfires. This model will help keep allergens and air pollutants at bay.

Coway Airmega AP-1512HH(W) Purifier

If you’ve got a large room in need of fresh air, take our advice and spring for this under $200 model. Coway is a brand we know and trust—in fact, the Omega 250 (which is also currently on sale, though for almost double the price tag of this model) received top billing in our Best Air Purifiers story, with features editor Nick Mafi calling it “kind of incredible” and citing the power of its four layer filtration system. This particular model has more than 21,000 five-star reviews and comes in at well under $200, which we thinks makes buying one a breeze.

Levoit Vital 200S-P Air Purifier

Here’s another deal for the pet lovers. This Levoit model was specifically designed to suck up dander and pet hair—as well as all the other stuff that air purifiers can crush like VOCs and smoke. It’s smart, which means you can program a cleaning schedule or shut off time and it can be controlled via your phone. It also gets points for having eco-friendly, price conscious washable filters.

Dyson Purifier Cool TP4B Purifying Fan

This is the perfect time to take advantage of this dual purifier and tower fan from Dyson. Get up to 350 degrees of cooling with their unique oscillation feature and purify the air while you do it with the brand’s signature HEPA filter system.

Levoit Core 400S Smart True HEPA Air Purifier

We spy a nice discount on one of our all time favorite air purifiers. According to our tester, social media manager Rebecca Grambone, “After about a week using the air purifier in my bedroom (along with regular dusting), I noticed that I wasn’t waking up with puffy eyes anymore. This may sound cliché, but the air in my room felt crisper and definitely cleaner.”

Prime Day Home Decor Deals

While you might not think of Amazon as home to loads of chic decor, we’re here to help point you in the right direction for accents that make all the difference.

Georg Jensen Bernadotte Stainless Steel Sugar Bowl

Didn’t think we’d be seeing a host of Prime Day Deals from legendary Georg Jensen anytime soon, but Bezos likes to keep us on our toes. We’re partial to this super chic sugar bowl set, made out of Jensen’s signature stainless steel—currently 25% off!—and we would also recommend perusing the other items the brand is discounting (hello gorgeous cocktail shaker and leather coaster set), as they make great gifts for housewarmings, weddings, and more.

Braun Classic Analogue Wall Clock

Going analog is looking very chic with this Bauhaus-influenced wall clock, which would pair perfectly with a silent morning and a black cup of coffee. The hour and minute hands feature luminescent tips for day and night visibility. You’d be surprised how much an analog clock keeps you from looking at your phone.

Sabre Paris Tortoise Cutlery (Set of 5)

One of our all time favorite silverware brands has a little discount running during Prime Day and it’s making us wonder if we should change things up for our next dinner party. While most of Sabre’s sets are full price right now, this lovely five-piece tortoise setting is 17% off.

Alessi Parrot Sommelier-Style Corkscrew

Another one of our favorite housewarming gifts to give, this Alessi parrot corkscrew is undeniably adorable. It’s also available in black which, yes is less expensive, but we much prefer the multicolor version to put a smile on your giftee’s face—and it is still 15% off. Pair with a bottle of wine or corked beverage of choice for an even more elevated gift.

Loloi Magnolia Home by Joanna Gaines Mona Collection Area Rug

When design juggernaut Joanna Gaines drops a collection of area rugs with Loloi, we’re listening. When they’re up to 20% off during October Prime Day, we’re adding to cart immediately. Loloi is a brand long known for its quality and collaborations with all stars like Gaines, Gwyneth Paltrow’s designer Brigette Romanek, Amber Lewis, and more. Dozens more of our favorite Amazon rugs are on sale as we speak!

YnM Chunky Throw Blanket

There’s chunky knit, and then there’s chunkiest knit. Even looking at this blanket makes us feel relaxed. It comes in 21 color varieties, but the cerulean blue is doing wonders to calm the mind. Aside from being made by one of our favorite weighted blanket brands, it’s also zero-shed and machine washable!

KDG Cordless Table Lamp (Set of 2)

You’ve almost certainly seen and/or played with a version of one of these dimmable, portable lamps at a restaurant in the last few years. Why not bring a few home with you? They’re practical, versatile, and one of the more reliable portable lamp options out there. We love their transitional quality—which can suit a kitchen table, a desk, or a patio table (they’re outdoor proof!). Black seems the obvious choice, but we like the brushed nickel, too!

Gibson Elite Rhinebeck 16-Piece Dinnerware Set

One of our favorite dinnerware sets is also one of the most affordable this October! A 16-piece set for $60, both microwave and dishwasher safe. We love the stoneware design, which would suggest a much higher price point, and your guests will never know.

Mackenzie-Childs Checkered Tissue Box Cover

Somewhat of a polarizing figure int he design world, Mackenzie-Childs is known for whimsical, maximalist designs often featuring a checkered pattern. This tissue box cover adds a little touch of design to an otherwise not so lovely item, and we are here for the $30 price cut.

Phantoscope Pack of 2 Velvet Decorative Throw Pillow Covers

12,000 Amazon customers love this velvet throw pillow set, which comes in basically every colorway possible, as well as six different sizes to best compliment your couch to pillow ratio. If you’re like us and went in on the white couch trend, we’re going dark coffee, taupe, or blue for decor options. We love that they’re soft, simple, and machine washable.

Nest New York Classic Grapefruit Scented Candle

We can be hard-pressed to find a good candle under $40 these days, so we’re glad this one from popular candle maker NEST New York comes in just under the bar at $38. We’re partial to the crisp grapefruit variety, but several other popular scents are discounted as well.

Mueller Fruit Bowl

A perennial design lover favorite, the Mueller fruit bowl is now 40% off. On sale in white, gray, and a punchy lime green, you can keep it front and center on a kitchen countertop or use it on a desk for mail. It would also make a fine centerpiece for a dining or coffee table.

Best Choice Products 8-Cube Storage Organizer

These customizable and solid wood shelves come in every neutral color to best suit your space. They’re an easy and attractive storage hack for toys, books, yarn, all the random wires and plugs we accumulate and have one reserved basket for, or anything else you’re tired of seeing on your floor—these shelves can provide a storing refuge.

Oiahomy Woven Storage Basket (Set of 3)

In our opinion, you can never (ever!) have too many decorative storage baskets. As long as there’s space, there’s likely stuff to fill them and this set, available in a pack of three, is a very handsome option. Try one of several different colorways and sizes if you want to spice things up.

Nathan James Mina Rattan Nightstand

Good furniture on Amazon can be hard to come by, and we are most definitely experts on that. Nathan James is one of the more reliable brand names you can find on the megaretailer’s site, and we particularly appreciate the mixed materials on this little nightstand, cheap enough to get a set of two during October Prime Day at 15% off.

Amazon Basics Saddle-Seat Stool (Set of 2)

At 24 inches and in walnut, black, and white, this handsome stool set will most certainly work for your high-top, bar, kitchen island turned workspace, you name it. Put a plant on them, use them in a mudroom, either way they would be a handsome addition to your home.

Christopher Knight Home Louver Club Chairs

We’ve said it once and we’ll say it again, fall Prime Day is a great time to stock up on outdoor furniture. We typically see much deeper discounts in October than July (perhaps the reasons for that are obvious!) but if you are looking to stash away some discounted digs that you can use next season—or you live in warmer climes—we definitely recommend hopping on bigger purchases, like these Christopher Knight chairs before the sale wraps.

nuLOOM Round Rigo Jute Rug

Pair that new set of chairs with a round outdoor rug. Though we will say that this nuLOOM rug, made of natural fibers and available in 12 colors, would look equally at home indoors as out. It also comes in more size and shape varieties than we can count and has nearly 17,000 5-star reviews from Amazon shoppers.

Kitchen Prime Day Home Deals

One room in the home that shouldn't be ignored when it comes to all the things Prime Day has to offer: the kitchen.There are lots of good deals being cooked up this time around—think markdowns on appliances and gadgets abound. Top rated coffeemakers, nonstick or stainless steel cookware, air fryers and more are in the mix. Don’t skip a Prime Day sale must-have kitchen appliances like a blender or a standing mixer.

Vitamix 5200 Blender

If you’ve ever wanted a Vitamix, we’d highly recommend taking advantage of this price tag while you can. This Amazon Big Deal Days price the lowest we’ve seen this particular model priced at and it was a bestseller during last year’s Prime Day sale as well. Your smoothies will never look the same—get it while the two-day sale window lasts.

KitchenAid Classic Series Stand Mixer K45SS

The perfect gift for the baker or serious chef in your life, if ever there was one. This iconic stand mixer from Kitchenaid is one of the better discounts we’ve seen and it’s iconic for many reasons: It has ten speeds to do everything from making pasta dough to whipping cream, has a removable and easy-to-wash stainless steel bowl, and comes with a one-year limited warranty.

Our Place Ceramic Perfect Pot

Seen in the of many an AD editor and many a celebrity (we’re looking at you cover star Justina Blakeney) the Perfect Pot from Our Place is both functional cookware and great to look at. And, at more than $60 off, if you’ve had your eye on the internet famous brand, now is the time to jump!

Our Place Always Pan 2.0

Go ahead and buy the matching set, we’re not judging! As one of the more exciting cookware brands of the last few years, Our Place made its debut with the Always Pan, which has since been upgraded to outshine the original. The 2.0 is oven safe up to 450 degrees and they reconfigured the nonstick ceramic coating for longer use.

Le Creuset Enameled Cast Iron Signature Sauteuse Oven, 3.5 qt, Meringue

For a more classic cookware look and feel, there is always Le Creuset. An investment piece for the ages, you can save $30 on this 3.5 quart sauteuse. We also caught a great deal on their cast iron skillet if that’s up your alley.

Staub Ceramics Rectangular Baking Dish Set

We spotted some Staub on sale as well! Make like Gwyneth Paltrow (her kitchen is absolutely filled with pieces of every shape and size) and stock up immediately. This 2-piece ceramic set is a healthy 16% off, and it’s the lowest price on the set in the last 30 days. It’s a good thing we love cherry red because the other colorways are not on sale. If you dig them as much as we do, the cocottes are also discounted.

KitchenAid 6 Speed Hand Mixer with Flex Edge Beaters

If you’re looking for a hand mixer, this one has more than 16,000 five-star reviews. Like many KitchenAid products, it’s sold in several colors and the Contour Silver and Ice Blue versions are also discounted at the moment (though we are partial to the red).

All-Clad D3 3-Ply Stainless Steel Fry Pan Set

How does Amazon Prime Day work?

A Prime membership is required to take advantage of all the best Prime Day deals. Luckily, it is very easy to become an Amazon Prime member. They offer a free 30-day trial for newbies, and after that it’s $14.99 per month or $139 per year to take advantage of fast free delivery, Prime Video, and all the other benefits the mega retailer offers.

Now, as for the deals. Some last the full 48 hours, others are what they call “lightning deals” and they usually don’t last more than a few hours, so you have to act fast to take advantage. New offers on trending products roll in pretty consistently.
